title: Eyewitness Accounts of WWI
author: Mark Cartwright
excerpt: The First World War (1914-18) was the first truly global conflict and the first to be fully mechanised. Armies clashed across continents on land, in the air...

title: The 1918 Armistice with Germany
author: Mark Cartwright
excerpt: The armistice that ended the First World War (1914-18) on the Western Front was signed between Germany and the Allies on 11 November 1918. The guns fell silent...
